reviewText: If your near the Crab Habitat, you will enjoy this documentary....abt crabs in Maryland
what a way to keep up with the industry.

The Chesapeake is a wonderful place.  I found the original book online and this is a great to have this to go along with it.  David Harp and Tom Horton do wonderful work in capturing the Chesapeake and what it going on there.
A wonderful look at a classic book, and the iconic blue crab that inspired it.
Wonderful and beautiful film about the Chesapeake Bay Atlantic Blue crabs and the culture and watermen who pursue them for the pleasure of our tables.
Loved it.  A great follow up/update of the original!
